item.title: Python Stuff
item.description: Here’s my blog about Python: First here’s how R and Python interact with reticulate(). #inserting code here UT <- "hook" library(reticulate) #PYTHON CHUNK y = "'em" print(r.UT,y) ## hook 'em cat(c(UT,py$y)) ## hook 'em
